attributes.action: take action on unnecessary useage of lights around Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for people who want action to be taken against Climate change through these ideas.Number 1 and most important is to turn of every second lamppost light on motorways throughout Britain, they unnecessary and as many other roads in britain aren't lit at all why should Motorways be and to a huge extent.Number 2 is to Ban Shops keeping lights on throughout their store during the night, as when does the public shop during night. Number 3 is to turn certain traffic lights off around Britain during early morning preferably around three and four a.m. as at them times people are sat at lights burning fuel wasting energy and the lights wasting electricity. I need you to sign this petition to make these ideas go into action to help save energy in Britain and help the environment.
